sentences.en: Burt had high regard for his old law professor, Dr. Finch (= he respected him a lot ) .
sentences.cn: 伯特对他以前的法律教授芬奇博士非常敬重。

sentences.en: Edith was widely regarded as (= considered by many people to be ) eccentric.
sentences.cn: 许多人认为伊迪丝是个怪人。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: He does not regard his new job as a poisoned chalice.
sentences.cn: 他并不认为自己的新工作是金杯毒酒。

sentences.en: He has no respect, no regard for anyone's feelings.
sentences.cn: 他不尊重，也不顾及别人的感受。

sentences.en: He has said he will fire editorial employees without regard to seniority.
sentences.cn: 他说过不管资历如何，任何编辑人员他都有可能解雇。

sentences.en: he made enquiries with regard to Beth.
sentences.cn: 他问及贝思的事情。

sentences.en: He said he retained immense regard and esteem for the prime minister.
sentences.cn: 他说他一直极其尊重和敬仰首相。

sentences.en: He suffers from a lack of self-regard.
sentences.cn: 他缺乏自尊。

sentences.en: He was regarded as the most successful president of modern times.
sentences.cn: 他被看成是近代最成功的总统。

sentences.en: Hope to see you soon. Regards, Chris
sentences.cn: 希望很快见到你。 祝安，克里斯

sentences.en: I regard creativity both as a gift and as a skill.
sentences.cn: 我认为创造力既是一种天赋也是一种技巧。

sentences.en: I regard this as a serious matter.
sentences.cn: 我认为这件事很重要。

sentences.en: In this regard nothing has changed.
sentences.cn: 在这方面没什么变化。

sentences.en: My husband sends his regards .
sentences.cn: 我丈夫向你问好。

sentences.en: She had an almost Germanic regard for order.
sentences.cn: 她简直像德国人一样讲究条理。

sentences.en: She stood back and regarded him coldly.
sentences.cn: 她退后站着，冷冷地看着他。

sentences.en: Teachers are held in low regard in this society (= are not respected or admired ) .
sentences.cn: 教师在这个社会里不受尊重。

sentences.en: The people in the room seemed to regard her as an unwelcome intruder.
sentences.cn: 屋子里的人似乎把她当成不受欢迎的外人。

sentences.en: The President tended to regard the Church as an anachronism.
sentences.cn: 总统常常认为教会属于落伍之物。

sentences.en: The voters hold her in high regard (= respect or admire her ) .
sentences.cn: 选民都很尊敬她。

sentences.en: there was little incentive for them to be active in this regard.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上，还缺乏促使他们积极主动的激励。

sentences.en: There were armed people about, people with little regard for human life.
sentences.cn: 到处都是武装分子，视人命如草芥。

sentences.en: Try to view situations more objectively, especially with regard to work.
sentences.cn: 要尽量客观地分析情况，尤其是在工作上。

sentences.en: We regard the band as a thorough shambles.
sentences.cn: 我们认为那个乐队一塌糊涂。

words.tran_cn: 留心的；表示敬意的；深切注意的；关心的

phrases.phrase: in regard to 或 with regard to

phrases.tran_cn: 对…的注意没，尊重；考虑到

phrases.phrase: with (或 in 或 having) regard to
phrases.tran_cn: 关于，至于；就…而言，在…方面

trans.tran_cn: 尊敬，敬佩，关注，问候，致意
trans.tran_en: good wishes - used when sending your good wishes to someone or when ending a short letter or message
to think about someone or something in a particular way
